H3.text: Who elects a new Pope. Cardinalate

A4.text: The cardinals have nevertheless consistently elected the Bishop of Rome from among their own membership since the death of Pope Urbanâ€¯VI in 1389.

A5.text: The conclave is restricted to eligible cardinals under the age limit of 80, and only cardinals can vote in a papal conclave.
